login.title: Welcome to ShortLink
login.subtitle: Sign in to manage your shortened URLs
login.description: Enter your credentials to access your account

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Reset your password to regain access
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
forgotPassword.emailSentDescription: We've sent a password reset link to your email. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password
resetPassword.description: Please enter your new password below
resetPassword.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters long
resetPassword.passwordMax: Password must be at most 100 characters long
resetPassword.confirmPasswordMin: Confirm password must be at least 6 characters long
resetPassword.confirmPasswordMax: Confirm password must be at most 100 characters long
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been reset. You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.invalidLinkDescription: The password reset link is invalid or has expired.

register.title: Join ShortLink
register.subtitle: Create an account to start shortening URLs

register.name: Name
register.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number (e.g. +84912345678)
register.agreeTermsInvalid: You must accept the terms and conditions

register.nameMax: Name must be at most 50 characters long
register.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
register.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters long
register.passwordMax: Password must be at most 100 characters long
register.confirmPasswordMin: Confirm password must be at least 6 characters long
register.confirmPasswordMax: Confirm password must be at most 100 characters long

auth.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

verify2FA.subtitle: Verify your identity

oauth.loginTerms: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
oauth.registerTerms: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: We are committed to providing fast, secure, and reliable URL shortening solutions to people worldwide.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We aim to help people share information faster, easier, and more securely through powerful, user-friendly URL shortening tools.

fast.title: Fast
fast.description: Shorten your URLs in just seconds.

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: Protect your links with passwords and advanced encryption.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Track clicks, locations, and user behavior in detail.

global.title: Global
global.description: Service available to users all over the world.

userFirst.title: User First
userFirst.description: We prioritize your experience and needs.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: We protect your data and never share it with third parties.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Committed to quality and continuous innovation.

cta.title: Start shortening your links today!
cta.description: Join millions who already trust our service.

Dashboard.title: Link Dashboard
Dashboard.subtitle: Manage and monitor all your shortened links
Dashboard.searchPlaceholder: Search by URL, alias or description...
Dashboard.createDialogDescription: Enter information to create a short link with advanced features
Dashboard.editDialogDescription: Update information and settings for your link
Dashboard.deleteLinkDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the link "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
Dashboard.deleteLinkDefaultDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this link? This action cannot be undone.

Analytics.title: Link Analytics
Analytics.subtitle: Track and analyze your link performance

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect for getting started with basic features

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Ideal for individuals and teams needing advanced features

business.name: Business
business.description: Designed for large organizations with comprehensive needs

enterprise.title: Custom Enterprise
enterprise.description: Tailored solutions for large businesses with specific requirements

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.a1: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time without additional costs.
faq.q2: Is there a free trial available?
faq.a2: We offer a 14-day free trial for the Pro plan. No credit card required.
faq.q3: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan at any time?
faq.a3: Yes, you can change your plan at any time, and changes will apply immediately.
faq.a4: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for enterprise plans.

Footer.description: ShortLink helps you shorten, track, and manage your links easily and efficiently.

Profile.title: Profile Settings
Profile.subtitle: Manage your account information and security settings
Profile.fullnameMinLength: Full name must be at least 2 characters
Profile.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
Profile.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
Profile.currentPasswordMin: Current password must be at least 6 characters long
Profile.newPasswordMin: New password must be at least 6 characters long
Profile.newPasswordMax: New password must be at most 100 characters long
Profile.confirmPasswordMin: Confirm password must be at least 6 characters long
Profile.confirmPasswordMax: Confirm password must be at most 100 characters long
Profile.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
Profile.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
Profile.setupTwoFactorDesc: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
Profile.scanQRCodeDesc: Use Google Authenticator or similar app to scan this QR code
Profile.disableTwoFactorDesc: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA?
Profile.disableTwoFactorWarning: Disabling 2FA will make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to continue?

NotFound.title: Not Found
NotFound.subtitle: The link you are looking for does not exist
NotFound.description: The link you accessed may have expired, been deleted, or does not exist. Please check the URL again or return to the homepage.

Manage2FA.title: Manage Two-Factor Authentication
Manage2FA.subtitle: Generate new 2FA codes for your account
Manage2FA.generateDescription: Create new QR code and secret key to set up on your Authenticator app
Manage2FA.newCodeDescription: Scan the QR code or enter the secret key into your Authenticator app
Manage2FA.scanQRInstruction: Scan this QR code using Google Authenticator or similar app
Manage2FA.secretInstruction: Or manually enter this secret key into your app
Manage2FA.step1: Click 'Generate New Code' to create new QR code and secret key
Manage2FA.step2: Scan QR code with Google Authenticator app or manually enter secret key
Manage2FA.step3: Enter the 6-digit code from Authenticator app into verification field
Manage2FA.step4: Click 'Update 2FA Code' to apply the new code to your account

Error.title: Something went wrong
Error.subtitle: An error occurred while processing your request
Error.description: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
Error.helpDescription: If you continue to experience issues, please contact our support team for assistance.

EmailVerification.title: Email Not Verified
EmailVerification.description: Please verify your email address to continue. We've sent a verification link to your email.
EmailVerification.checkEmail: Please check your email inbox and spam folder

Cookies.title: Cookie Policy
Cookies.subtitle: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. Learn about the types of cookies we use and how to manage them.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.description1: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help the website remember information about your visit, making your next visit easier and the website more useful to you.
whatAreCookies.description2: Cookies don't contain personally identifiable information and cannot run malicious code. They are simply text data used to improve user experience.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be turned off.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how users interact with our website.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Store preferences and settings to improve experience.

security.title: Security Cookies
security.description: Protect the website from attacks and fraud.

chrome.name: Chrome
steps: Click the three-dot menu in the top right corner

firefox.name: Firefox
steps: Click the three-bar menu in the top right corner
Find the 'Cookies and Site Data' section

safari.name: Safari
steps: Manage cookies and website tracking settings

warning.title: Important note
warning.description: Disabling cookies may affect website functionality. Some features may not work properly if you disable all cookies.

support.title: Need help with cookies?
support.description: If you have questions about how we use cookies or need help managing cookie settings, don't hesitate to contact us.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: We're always ready to listen and support you. Contact us whenever you need!

urgentSupport.title: Emergency Support
urgentSupport.description: If you encounter urgent issues, please email with subject "URGENT" or call our hotline for priority support.

form.title: Send Message
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Describe your issue or question in detail...
form.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us! We will respond within 24 hours.

validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Q: How long does it take to get a response?
faq.a1: A: We commit to responding within 24 business hours.
faq.q2: Q: Can I request new features?
faq.a2: A: Yes! We always welcome user feedback and suggestions.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

dataCollection.title: 1. Information we collect
items: Personal information: Name, email, phone number when you register an account
Usage data: Links you create, number of clicks, access time
Technical information: IP address, browser type, operating system
Cookies and tracking data to improve user experience

dataUsage.title: 2. How we use information
items: Provide and maintain link shortening service
Provide statistics and analytics to users
Improve and develop new features
Send important service notifications
Customer support and technical issue resolution

dataSharing.title: 3. Information sharing with third parties
items: We DO NOT sell your personal information
Only share when legally required
Use trusted service providers (hosting, analytics)
All partners must strictly comply with privacy policy

dataSecurity.title: 4. Information security
items: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission
Encryption of sensitive data in databases
Regular security audits and system updates
Access limited to necessary staff only
Secure data backup and disaster recovery

dataStorage.title: 5. Data storage and deletion
items: Data stored in secure data centers
You can request account and data deletion anytime
Anonymous statistical data may be kept for analysis
Comply with legal data retention regulations

userRights.title: 6. Your rights
items: Access right: View personal information we have about you
Edit right: Update or modify personal information
Delete right: Request deletion of account and personal data
Opt-out right: Refuse marketing emails or notifications
Complaint right: Contact data protection authority if needed

support.title: Questions about this policy?
support.description: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, don't hesitate to contact us.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.subtitle: Please read our terms and conditions of service carefully. Using our service means you accept these terms.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of terms
items: By using our service, you agree to comply with these terms
If you don't agree with any terms, please stop using the service
We reserve the right to update these terms at any time
Continued use after updates means acceptance of new terms

userAccount.title: 2. User accounts
items: You must provide accurate information when registering
You are responsible for securing your login information
Each person may only create one unique account
We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate terms

acceptableUse.title: 3. Acceptable use
items: Create short links for legitimate and proper purposes
Share links with others responsibly
Use analytics features to track effectiveness
Report technical issues so we can improve the service

prohibitedUse.title: 4. Prohibited behavior
items: Creating links to illegal, harmful, or inappropriate content
Using the service for spam, fraud, or causing harm
Attempting to breach or disrupt the system
Copying, reselling, or commercially exploiting the service
Creating fake accounts or providing false information

liability.title: 5. Responsibility and limitations
items: Service provided "as is" without any warranty
We are not responsible for the content of original links
Users are solely responsible for their use of the service
We reserve the right to discontinue service at any time
No guarantee of 100% system uptime

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual property rights
items: All service intellectual property rights belong to us
You retain ownership of content you share
You grant us rights to use data to provide services
May not copy, redistribute source code or designs

pricing.title: Pricing information
pricing.freeDescription: We provide all features completely free for users

detailedStats.name: Detailed Statistics
detailedStats.description: View click analytics and traffic sources

support.title: Questions about terms?
support.description: If you need clarification on any terms or have legal questions, please contact our legal department.
